ARTICLE.ART_INFO_SHORT: Floor To Celing Siliding Wardrobe Shutters

COMBOBOX.name: Wrd_Top_Panel
COMBOBOX.label: Shutter Without top panel?
COMBOBOX.info: Select YES for full ceiling height

EDITBOX.name: ART_SIZEXWD
EDITBOX.label: Clear Width (2100mm to 3600mm) :
EDITBOX.info: Upto 2400mm for 2 Door Slding, 3600mm for 3 Door Sliding

EDITBOX.name: ART_SIZEYWD
EDITBOX.label: Depth (300mm to 680mm) :
EDITBOX.info: If any of the side panels are visible, input 680 mm

EDITBOX.name: F1_1P_DIVIDER
EDITBOX.label: Divider 1 Space
EDITBOX.Info: if you want the Excat space then enter value with mm, Else enter only 1 or 2 to get equal zones

EDITBOX.Info: if you want the Excat space then enter value with mm, Else enter only 1 or 2 to get equal zones
